About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Taylor Noyer Is a Engagement Marketing & Operational Management Professional in Los Angeles, California. Having successfully managed and executed hundreds of physical and interactive experiences, Taylor has gained a robust understanding of what is takes to accomplish premium results.

ENGAGEMENT MANAGEMENT

Project Management

Engagement management (EM) is a context for project management. Engagement Management is a process that brings together client relations (sales and support), project management, delivery and quality management to satisfy clients. EM operates across multiple projects and ongoing relationships

ENGAGEMENT PLANNER

Planner

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Voluptates perferendis totam enim. Nesciunt porro dolores expedita dolor necessitatibus deserunt nemo.

OPERATIONAL MANAGEMENT

Operational Planning

Operations management (OM) is the administration of business practices to create the highest level of efficiency possible within an organization. It is concerned with converting materials and labor into goods and services as efficiently as possible to maximize the profit of an organization.
